member.name: M:BlazeJump.Tools.CommonServices.ConfigureServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Configures and registers all BlazeJump common services with the dependency injection container.
member.param: The service collection to add services to.
member.remarks:
This method registers the following services as singletons:
IIdentityService - Manages Nostr identities and keys
IMessageService - Handles Nostr event messaging
INotificationService - Manages application notifications
IRelayManager - Manages connections to Nostr relays
IUserProfileService - Handles user profile operations
IMapper - AutoMapper instance for object mapping
